Generates light by causing a chemical reaction. Chemical light sources are widely used by stalkers as autonomous light sources in various emergency situations and other cases when there is no access to other lighting sources. Being completely self-sufficient, durable, fireproof, waterproof and suitable for long-term storage, their range of application is extremely wide. 
This variant emits a Green Light, it has a balanced range and illumination, good for almost everything.
